text: Oreste Capuzzo (7 December 1908 - 5 December 1985) was an Italian gymnast. He was born in Rivarolo and died in Genoa. He began competing in Milan in 1920. He won gold in the vault in 1932. He also competed in the 1936 Olympics. ==References== *Oreste Capuzzo's profile at Sports Reference Category:1908 births Category:1985 deaths Category:Italian male artistic gymnasts Category:Gymnasts at the 1932 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Olympic gold medalists for Italy Category:Olympic medalists in gymnastics Category:Medalists at the 1932 Summer Olympics
title: Oreste Capuzzo
